website_summaries.verdict: Basic yet extremely affordable – this is the model for anyone who wants a no-frills appliance.
pros: Comes with a quality carafe plus a reusable filter, so you don't have to buy the wasteful paper kind
We love the "pause and serve" function that lets you pour yourself a coffee during the brewing cycle
cons: Not as durable as offerings from trusted manufacturers

customer_reviews.title: I recommend kinda....
customer_reviews.text: Cool little stainless coffee pot. Looks a lot more expensive than it was. Works really well. I recommend. UPDATE: still works well however, the AM/Pm on the clock means nothing. The timer kicks the pot on at 6am AND 6PM even if nothing is in it. That’s kind of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: programability
customer_reviews.text: The coffee maker doesn't seem to know how to distinguish between am and pm. I set for 7am and it starts up at 7pm so I have to wait until after 7pm to program.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: A Good Coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: I have a small kitchen so I wanted a compact coffeemaker...this is perfect. It makes great coffee and even has a warmer setting which is great. The program controls are easy to use. Customer service is very good which is important. The only thing I can find wrong is that the machine gets hot to the touch. ----------- I highly recommend this machine. -----------
customer_reviews.author: BillieO

customer_reviews.title: Compact Coffee Maker- 12 cup
customer_reviews.text: Coffee maker takes up very little space; glass carafe does not drip and the coffee maker has three settings to suit your preferred coffee strength. The only drawback is that there is only a little space to load water so care must be taken.
customer_reviews.author: alan s.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It randomly comes on through out the day. It has not been programmed for autostart either. It has come on 3-4 times by itself in a single day. Its gotten to the point where we leave it unplugged amd only plug it in the morning and unplug it after about an hour so. Also leaks when you try to pour a cup while brewing which its not suppose to. Its not a lot but enough to piss you off.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee maker. Looks nice sitting on the counter. Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Finnell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I use it to make tea. Great that it has filter basket.
customer_reviews.author: nigel

customer_reviews.title: Best pot for brewing coffee
customer_reviews.text: I easily set the timer and the brew strength on this attractive coffee maker. The coffee pot is very quiet and the coffee is delicious. Great value, coffee and looks.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Buy another coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Can't set time for auto brew. Maker can't tell between A.M and P.M
customer_reviews.author: Joe gercis

customer_reviews.title: Magic Chef
customer_reviews.text: The coffee maker works good and at a great price. It is compact enough to travel with. The coffee maker looks just as shown in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Maine T

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this pot!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a SMALL coffee pot as my counter space is limited. So many pots these days are just huge!!! When I finally found this one, I was in heaven!! It is so small, yet makes 12 cups of coffee and has the timer feature, which we use every day! PERFECT!!! We did remove the "permanent"filter and use #4 cone filters instead. (The hassle of dumping the grounds out and rinsing the filter got old fast.) Would definitely recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: cathy adams

customer_reviews.title: awkward filling water chamber
customer_reviews.text: Makes good coffee. Option for three levels of robustness. Easy to clean. Trying to get the water into the water chamber from the coffee pot is difficult, no way to tip pot far enough to get last spoonful of water into chamber.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: great flavor
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use, touch screen is easy works with the most minimum of pressure, but most of all the flavor is great. We use 4 measuring spoons of coffee with 5 cups of water to make two mugs of coffee. Set on 2 bars.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN MAT

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Magic Chef. Good price and very solid. Small and compact and nice addition to my counter. Coffee tastes really good. Some coffee makers I have owned have a plastic taste and didn’t go away with cleaning. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad. It's junk! What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Italian Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee from the first pot. Nice pour on the carafe. My old one leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Etmacd

customer_reviews.title: defective/misleading programming
customer_reviews.text: It claims to be programmable but treats AM and PM the same. I suspect the "strength" setting is also fake. Did work otherwise though it died after less than a year (possibly related to previously having been turned on empty?)
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: A.M. vs P.M.?
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good coffee maker with a couple of exceptions. First off, it does not know the difference between A.M. and P.M. so as long as you don't set it too early it's fine. Second issue is mine came a bit wobbly. I had to file down one of the little feet to make it sit level on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: nova

product_meta.title: Magic Chef MCSCM12SS Coffee Maker, 8.6X 6.6X 12.9, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: The Magic Chef 12-Cup Coffee maker brews a perfect pot of Coffee when you want it. This Coffee maker has a Pause's serve feature that allows you to pour a cup during the brewing cycle. The 12-Cup capacity makes sure you have enough to fill your mug for Coffee on the go or for guests.
feature_bullets: Programmable timer lets you enjoy coffee when you want it
Easy-fill water tank with water level indicator
Non-stick warming plate to keep your coffee warm
Automatic shut-off for ease of mind
